entry.title: Leaner Drinkup at RubyKaigi 2023
entry.content:
æ—¥æœ¬èªã®èª¬æ˜æ–‡ã¯è‹±èªã®ä¸‹ã«ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™

Overview

Leaner Technologies Inc. is a Ruby sponsor of RubyKaigi 2023.
In addition, we will be hosting a drink up after the second day of the event!

In addition to delicious food from American Diner, there will be plenty of sake selected by Sake Supervisor @joker1007!
Although limited, this is a great opportunity for RubyKaigi attendees to meet and mingle.

Venue

RK PARKS

2-6-1 Chuo, Matsumoto City, Nagano, Japan. About 7 minutes walk from RubyKaigi venue

What to bring

Please remember to bring your RubyKaigi 2023 nametag!
Some outdoor terrace seating is available, so a jacket is a good idea.

Registration Fee

Free!

Time Schedule

Time Contents
18:15 Reception Start
18:30 Cheers!
21:30 End time

Supervisor's Selection Sake List

Japanese only Please see the end of this page

Remarks.

In case of clear skies, the number of seats on the terrace is available and may be increased just before the date of the event.

Agileware's Drink Up event is back!
Located right next to the RubyKaigi venue, within the beautiful surroundings of Shinshi Shrine, it's the perfect location.
The buffet menu is filled with delicious local ingredients such as Shinshu Ginjo pork, Alps salmon, and vegetables sourced from Nagano Prefecture. And of course, the drink menu, including local sake, is all-you-can-drink!
We also have 20 limited servings of vegan bento boxes available.

We strive to create a work-friendly environment that prioritizes employee satisfaction and convenience.

entry.title: ã€Money Forward x Shippioã€‘ BaySide Tech Nite
entry.content:
â€»æ—¥æœ¬èª follows English

Overview

More than half of the 50 sessions at RubyKaigi 2023 will be presented in English. RubyKaigi attracts many participants not only domestic but also many participants from overseas, and many people may have felt â€œenjoyableâ€ exchanging ideas with Rubyists from various countries or thought â€œI want to study English again!â€œ.

This time, we Shippio Inc., which sponsors RubyKaigi 2023 and is creating a global engineering organization and Money Forward Co., Ltd are planing to hold a RubyKaigi After Party titled [Money Forward x Shippio BaySide Tech Nite~International after party at RubyKaigi 2023~] with English LT and socializing.

The BaySide Tech Nite aims to boost the international engineering community in Japan.

We plan to have LT sessions where participants can share their thoughts and stories about RubyKaigi 2023, as well as discussions on technical topics related to Ruby. Please note that even those who have not participated in RubyKaigi2023 are welcome to attend this event. We are looking forward to seeing Rubyists all over the world.

Date and Time

  • Date: Friday, May 19, 2023, 19:00-21:00 (Registration 18:30-)
  • Place: Shippio Inc. office (Hamamatsucho Building 15F, 1-1-1 Shibaura, Minato-ku, Tokyo)
  • Admission: Free

Call for English LT speakers

Also,we are currently rectuiting English LT speakers ! If you are interested in challenging yourself with a LT in English, please answer the questionnaire application page to apply ! If itâ€™s related to Ruby, anything is fine but please prepare the materials in English. You will have 5 to 7 mins presentation.We will inform you of the results on May 9th.

Time Schedule

Time Content Speakers
19:00 Opening
19:05~19:50 LT by Money Forward and Shippio members
19:50 Reception Reception (Walk-ins LT welcome!)

(*We will announce the LT speakers at a later date.

Notes

  • The content and schedule of the day are subject to change without prior notice.
  • The event may be postponed or cancelled due to sudden illness of involved parties, natural disasters, infectionã€€situation, or other reasons.
  • This event is planned to be held offline. There are no plans to conduct the event online.
  • The appearance and content of this event may be made public at a later date.
  • If you have any problems, please contact â€œInquiries about this eventâ€ below this page.
  • All participants, including the organizers, are asked to agree to the code of conduct for RubyKaigi 2023. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

Handling of Personal Information

Our policy for handling personal information is as follows. Please register and participate in the event only if you agree to this policy.

  • Shippio Corporation: https://www.shippio.io/privacy-policy/
  • Money Forward, Inc.: https://corp.moneyforward.com/privacy/
